has research problem.from sentence: Multimodal Differential Network for Visual Question Generation

has research problem: Generating natural questions from an image

has research problem.from sentence: Generating natural questions from an image is a semantic task that requires using visual and language modality to learn multimodal representations .

has research problem: generating natural questions for an image

has research problem.from sentence: Here the au-thors have proposed the challenging task of generating natural questions for an image .
